languages.text: "Нет! Сделаешь это, элантах, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только моих сородичей — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. И я... я могу это предотвратить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".

traits.locale_text: "Нет! Сделаешь это, элантах, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только моих сородичей — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. И я... я могу это предотвратить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
languages.original_text: "Нет! Сделаешь это, элантах, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только моих сородичей — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. И я... я могу это предотвратить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".

traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No, elantach! Do this, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «¡No! Si haces esto, elantach, todo tu dominio se ahogará en sangre. Y no solo se derramará la sangre de mis congéneres; tus súbditos también hallarán una muerte espantosa. Y yo... yo puedo evitarlo. Ahora me toca a mí rescataros a ti y a los tuyos».
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: «¡No! Si haces esto, elantach, todo tu dominio se ahogará en sangre. Y no solo se derramará la sangre de mi gente; tus súbditos también hallarán una muerte espantosa. Y yo... yo puedo evitarlo. Ahora me toca a mí rescataros a ti y a los tuyos».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “住手！如果你这么做的话，外界人，你的整个王朝都会被鲜血淹没。不仅是我的族人，你的臣民也会迎来可怕的结局。而我……我可以阻止这一切。现在，轮到我来拯救你和你的族人了。”
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: “住手！如果你这么做的话，外界人，你的整个王朝都会被鲜血淹没。不仅是我的族人，你的臣民也会迎来可怕的结局。而我……我可以阻止这一切。现在，轮到我来拯救你和你的族人了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Non ! Si vous faites ça, elantach, votre domaine sera inondé de sang, et pas seulement celui des miens. Vos sujets connaîtront eux aussi une fin terrible. et je... je peux l'empêcher. C'est à moi de vous sauver, vous et les vôtres. »
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: « Non ! Si vous faites ça, elantach, votre domaine sera inondé de sang, et pas seulement celui des miens. Vos sujets connaîtront eux aussi une fin terrible. Mais... je peux l'empêcher. C'est à mon tour de vous sauver, vous et les vôtres. »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「エランタ！そんなことをすれば、あなたの領地はすべて血に染まる。私の血族だけでなく あなたの臣民も 恐ろしい結末を迎えるだろう。私は…私はこれを防ぐことができる。私があなたとあなたの民を救う番だ」
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: 「エランタ！そんなことをすれば、あなたの領地はすべて血に染まる。私の血族だけでなく あなたの臣民も 恐ろしい結末を迎えるだろう。私は…私はこれを防ぐことができる。私があなたとあなたの民を救う番だ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Nein! Wenn Ihr das tut, Elantach, wird Euer gesamtes Reich in Blut ertrinken. Nicht nur in dem Blut meinesgleichen, auch Eure Untertanen werden ein schreckliches Ende finden. Und ich ... Ich kann das verhindern. Nun bin ich an der Reihe, nun muss ich Euch und Euer Volk retten."
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: "Nein! Wenn Ihr das tut, Elantach, wird Euer gesamtes Reich in Blut ertrinken. Nicht nur in dem Blut meinesgleichen, auch Eure Untertanen werden ein schreckliches Ende finden. Und ich ... Ich kann das verhindern. Nun bin ich an der Reihe, nun muss ich Euch und Euer Volk retten."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Hayır! Elantach, bunu yaparsan yönetimindeki tüm bölgeler kana bulanır. Yalnızca benim soydaşlarım değil, tebaan da korkunç bir son yaşar. Ben... Bunu engelleyebilirim. Seni ve halkını kurtarma sırası bende."
languages.original_text: "No! Do this, elantach, and your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the blood of my kind, but your subjects will also meet a terrible end. And I... I can prevent it. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: "Hayır! Elantach, bunu yaparsan yönetimindeki tüm bölgeler kana bulanır. Yalnızca benim soydaşlarım değil, tebaan da korkunç bir son yaşar. Ben... Bunu engelleyebilirim. Seni ve halkını kurtarma sırası bende."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
